channel.title: Range
channel.description:
Im at 78 range, i want 85 fast, could care less about money
Not sure where i should train, soo ineed some help.
I tried yaks but there packed with bots and loads of people. I tried botting but my stuff fucked up for some reason >.> I tried sw and i hate it so much so im really not sure, i could do bandits but other then bandits being fast xp wise im really not sure. At 85 i plan to chin to 90 and do arma etc. So does anyone know what i should do for fast xp to 85 range?

I might need to go try it again >.<

Waiting on shit to sell, goin to buy a d pic do some mining and might just fucking chin range >.< so fast xp[/quote]
Wanna hear a fail joke?

Your mommas so fat, she has enough chins for 99 range.

item.title: Range
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

[quote=“Motokid126, post:7, topic:356807”]yeah cannoning at greens is fun, piss people off lol. Now everyone does it >.<

Just got void soo i might just go to yaks or bandits! Then at 80 should i start chinning or wait until 85?[/quote]Don’t do bandits with Void You’ll need a lot of prayer potions and the XP isn’t much different with range than at TzHaar or even Green Dragons.

item.title: Range
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

Train at TzHaar. Just get your range equipment and kill them from behind sulfer vents (just not the TzHaar-xils with rings). I pretty much did 60-89 on them. The XP isn’t insanely fast, but you won’t lose money for the most part and you can talk to people easily there. Besides, you can get obsidian drops and actually make money there, and there is also a bank nearby.

Read full topic
